It detects sophisticated Internet threats, which include: - Web sites hosting exploits that use malicious code; - phishing websites created to illegally obtain personal information of users; - compromised sites, t. e. originally serious and legitimate sites, which have become dangerous and unpredictable as a result of a malicious attack. It detects common types of viruses and spyware and protects you one of the following methods. - Scan the contents of the Web pages that you open up they will be displayed in a web browser. If the page contains hazardous objects javascript, component Online Shield stops the opening pages. Scanning the files you are trying to download. If the file is infected, Online Shield to immediately stop the download, the threat has not penetrated into the computer. Privacy Component AVG Internet Security "Personal data" protects your computer by monitoring running applications and processes and tracking all potentially dangerous actions. Protection against online threats Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Personal firewall component of AVG Firewall (Firewall) in the AVG Internet Security controls all network traffic on your computer. Depending on the setting, he allows or blocks attempts to connect to the network, as well as send and receive all types of data at any scale: from small local networks to the entire Internet. A properly configured AVG Firewall component will provide excellent protection against hacker attacks from the Internet. e-mail protection component of AVG Internet Security "email protection" provides complete email protection against viruses, spyware and spam. Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Anti-spam: Spam Protection Anti-Spam component scans all incoming and outgoing additional e-mail messages and marks unwanted messages as spam.
